News for hemaClass.org

Changes in version 1.0 - Oct. 2015

  • Manuscript titled "hemaClass.org: Online one-by-one normalization and classification of haematological malignancies" by Falgreen, Bilgrau, Jakobsen et al., has now been submitted for publication.

  • hemaClass functionality greatly expanded.

  • The package and website now supports proper reference-based one-by-one RMA pre-processing as well as regular cohort based RMA pre-processing. See rmaPreprocess and rmaReference.

  • Supports various cell-of-origin classification systems (see help(BAGS)):

    • B-Cell Associated Gene Signatures (BAGS)

    • Activated B-Cell-like and Germinal Center B-cell-like classification (ABC/GCB)

    • BAGS-extended ABC/GCB into ABC / GCB / GCB-CC/ GCB-CB

  • Supports various REsistance Gene Signatures (REGS) classifications for (see help(REGS)):

    • Rituximab (R)

    • Cyclophosphamide (C)

    • Doxorubicin (H)

    • Vincristine (O)

    • Dexamethasone (P) (Experimental!)

    • Melphalan (M)

  • hemaClass.org website functionality polished with context-dependent feedback. To use the website, go to http://hemaClass.org or see help(runHemaClass).

Changes in version 0.1 - Aug. 2014

  • Basic classification functionality.

  • hemaClass was created!
